body:
Hello dilpickel here and I have a idea for the credit shop.
When you kill someone they explode into fire or fireworks or hearts maybe potion colors, all kinds of stuff. 
I thought of this when I saw the gold nuggets drop when you kill someone.
I would love to read your ideas also!

title: New credit shop idea!

replies.body: That would cause more lag, no please.

replies.body: Well maybe soon when Avicus upgrades to a future version of minecraft where particles aren't laggy.

replies.body: Its the same thing as trails and they don't cause much lag. Also if you lag from particle effects turn them off or get a better computer.
